description.title: Description for App: User Data
description.value: Displays information about the ticket requester and requesters organization.

long_description.title: Long Description for App: User Data
long_description.value:
The Zendesk Support User Data app gives you customer information, including user and organization details such as tags, ticket activity, and contact, right next to a ticket.

With more context around the customer, your agents get a holistic view of the interactions your customers have had with your organization and can provide a more tailored response.

For any questions, please email [support@zendesk.com](mailto:support@zendesk.com).

By enabling this app, You agree to the [Built by Zendesk Terms of Use](https://www.zendesk.com/company/built-by-zendesk-agmt/).

installation_instructions.title: Installation Instructions for App: User Data
installation_instructions.value:
To install the User Data app:

1. Sign in to your Zendesk Support account, then click the Admin icon in the sidebar.
2. Select Apps > Marketplace, then find the User Data app and click the tile.
3. On the User Data app page, click Install app in the upper-right corner.
4. Enter a name for the app, then click Install.

label.title: Check box option in the settings to allow the admin to choose to open the apps tray automatically when the ticket loads

title.title: Header or the page showing the user settings in the App

save.title: Button at the bottom of the user data admin panel page to save and go back

text.title: Help text for the admin
text.value: Please select the user fields you would like to permanently display on the app

include_org_fields.title: Check box to display org fields

no_tags.title: Placeholder when there are no tags

no_domain_names.title: Placeholder when there are no domain names

update_organization_done.title: Growl notification to advise the admin the notes and details have been updated

update_user_done.title: Growl notification to advise the admin the notes and details have been updated

ajax_error.title: Error message notification
ajax_error.value: An error occurred. Please try again later.

tickets.title: Number of tickets for this user after this it will always be a number like 12 or 3

toggle_details_notes.title: Link to toggle open / close the details and notes box

toggle_organization.title: Link to toggle open / close the organization box

details_and_notes.title: Header/title for the details and notes box

details.title: Details box after this will be an editable text box

notes.title: Notes box after this will be an editable text box

tags.title: List of the tags of this user

hold.title: first letter of status hold (on hold)

pre.title: this is text displayed in the app to say which account does the ticket come from, it will say for instance this ticket is from the spoke account COMPANY. The only variable here is the word Company, the word spoke is added as a string after
pre.value: This ticket is from the spoke account:

account.title: This is the account from this user

spoke_ticket_id.title: this is the ticket ID from the spoke of that user
